# tracks(withMediaType:)

**Instance Method**

Returns tracks that contain media of a specified type.

## Declaration

```swift
func tracks(withMediaType mediaType: AVMediaType) -> [AVAssetTrack]
```

## Parameters

- **mediaType**: The media type of the tracks to return.

## Return Value

An array of tracks, which is empty if there are no tracks with the media type.

## Discussion

\You can call this method without blocking the current thread when the data in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/tracks] property is already loaded.
